email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we would like the demurrage rate to be capped at $18,000 per day. Can you confirm? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laycan confirmation. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to the demurrage cap of $18,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details and laycan confirmation for 15-20 October. Please review and let me know if everything is in order. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $50.00 per metric ton and the demurrage cap of $18,000 per day. Please send over the contract for signing. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll send over the contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation and looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best, Sarah.
